nodes.text: Skone II was a planet in the Skone system of Brak sector, located in the Expansion Region. The planet was capable of foodstuff production and had manufacturing capabilities.

During the Galactic Civil War, the wider Skone system was heavily restricted by the Galactic Empire due to the presence of an Imperial Navy staging zone. Despite the security, the Alliance established a listening post on the planet to spy on Imperial activities in the staging area.
